.. _user_guide:

============
User Guide
============

Welcome to the ``fusionlab`` User Guide!

This guide provides detailed information on using the library,
from core concepts and model architectures to specific features,
utilities, data handling, and practical case studies.

Explore the sections below to learn how to effectively use ``fusionlab``
for your time series forecasting tasks.
